params.name: name of the parameter group
params.overdueDays_: the number of days after which a loan is considered overdue
params.writeOffPercentage_: the write off rate in percent

file(DataTypes.Storage storage,bytes32,u.notice: file allows governance to change parameters of the contract
file allows governance to change parameters of the contract

repayLoan(DataTypes.Storage storage,uint.notice: repay updates the NAV for a new repaid loan

writeOff(DataTypes.Storage storage,uint2.notice: writeOff writes off a loan if it is overdue

userdoc.notice: Main entry point for senior LPs (a.k.a. capital providers)  Automatically invests across borrower pools using an adjustable strategy.
